snippet: Alex Webster was an important part of one of New York's glory teams, the Giants of the late '50s and early '60s, when football built momentum to become America's most popular sport.
abstract: Alex Webster was an important part of one of New York's glory teams, the Giants of the late '50s and early '60s, when football built momentum to become America's most popular sport.

headline.main: Remembering Alex Webster, Giants Star and Coach
